outcome: A mysterious faction within the Council seeks to exploit the BCI's vulnerabilities.

events.description: A faction within the Council discreetly convenes to discuss leveraging BCI vulnerabilities for power.
Reports of unauthorized access attempts on BCI data systems are quietly noted by security officials.
Encrypted communications reveal plans to expose weaknesses and blame rival factions.
Anomalies in BCI scoring revealed to public, leading to mounting mistrust in system integrity.
